# requiresDNSSECValidation | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

-  requiresDNSSECValidation 

Instance Property# requiresDNSSECValidation

iOS 16.1+iPadOS 16.1+Mac Catalyst 16.1+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.1+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 9.1+

```
var requiresDNSSECValidation: Bool { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableURLRequest/requiresDNSSECValidation#discussion)

Sets whether a request is required to do DNSSEC validation during DNS lookup.

YES, if the DNS lookup for this request should require DNSSEC validation, No otherwise. Defaults to NO.
